specifications.Dye Method: Piece Dye - Yarn Effect > High Twist Yarn High twist yarn is made by tightly twisting staple fibers or filament yarns, resulting in a higher number of twists per unit length. It adds texture, a crisp feeling, and a cool touch to the fabric.
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Satin Weave > Crepe Satin This fabric is easily damaged by rubbing or scratching, so please handle it with care.
specifications.Care Instructions: Dry clean only Sustainability Eco-forward > Dead Stock This fabric is deadstock (leftover from previous productions) and will not be restocked after selling out. Recommended Use Dresses, Blouses, Partywear, Abaya
